about_the_game: This patch adds a toggle to the options so the player can opt into the erotic scenes. These are a handful of consensual, text-only sex scenes between the main character and her boyfriend (who is a mythological being with no head) that happen later in the game.

content_descriptors.notes: There are a handful of consensual, text-only sex scenes between the main character and her boyfriend (who is a mythological being with no head) that this patch unlocks. These scenes are on a "romance novel" level in terms of explicitness. Once or twice, one or both of them also (legally) drink alcohol.

detailed_description: This patch adds a toggle to the options so the player can opt into the erotic scenes. These are a handful of consensual, text-only sex scenes between the main character and her boyfriend (who is a mythological being with no head) that happen later in the game.
name: the head well lost - erotic scenes patch

dejus.descriptors:
Sexo Explícito
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas

short_description: Patch adding erotic scenes for the head well lost
